original_text: Now all the people that came out were circumcised: but all the people that were born in the wilderness by the way as they came forth out of Egypt, them they had not circumcised.
korean_text: 그 나온 백성은 다 할례를 받았으나 다만 애굽에서 나온 후 광야 길에서 난 자는 할례를 받지 못하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Now all the people that came out were circumcised
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 나온 모든 백성은 할례를 받았다

sentences.original_text: but all the people that were born in the wilderness
by the way as they came forth out of Egypt
